body_html:
Bazel can absolutely handle .tar.xz.

mirror.bazel.build and the canonical authoritative URL is the minimum requirement.

Long term might be nice if more trusted orgs wanted to help us diversify our mirroring of public artifacts.
body_text:
Bazel can absolutely handle .tar.xz.
mirror.bazel.build and the canonical authoritative URL is the minimum requirement.
Long term might be nice if more trusted orgs wanted to help us diversify our mirroring of public artifacts.
body:
Bazel can absolutely handle .tar.xz.

mirror.bazel.build and the canonical authoritative URL is the minimum requirement.

Long term might be nice if more trusted orgs wanted to help us diversify our mirroring of public artifacts.
